snippet: Steven A. Cohen, the founder of SAC Capital Advisors, is usually a regular at the Art Basel Miami Beach, but not this year, reports David Segal.
abstract: Steven A. Cohen, the founder of SAC Capital Advisors, is usually a regular at the Art Basel Miami Beach, but not this year, reports David Segal.

headline.main: A Hedge Fund Titan Is Missing at the Art Fair
